00216     : BondPotential(simulation),
00217       interactionPtr_(0)

00229    /* 
00230    * Destructor. 
00231    */
00232    template <class Interaction>
00233    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~BondPotentialImpl() 
00234    {
00235       if (interactionPtr_) {
00236          delete interactionPtr_;
00237          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00238       }
00239    }

00248    /*
00249    * Read bond interaction parameters.
00250    */
00251    template <class Interaction>
00252    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00253    {
00254       readBegin(in,"BondPotential");
00255       bool nextIndent = false;
00256       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00257       readEnd(in);
00258    }

00307    /*
00308    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00309    */
00310    template <class Interaction>
00311    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00312    {  addForces(true, false);  }
00313 
00314    /*
00315    * Increment atomic forces and compute pair energy for this processor.
00316    */
00317    template <class Interaction>
00318    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(double& energy)
00319    {  energy = addForces(true, true);  }
00320 
00321    /*
00322    * Compute total bond energy on all processors.
00323    */
00324    template <class Interaction>
00325    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00326    void 
00327    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00328    #else
00329    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00330    #endif
00331    { 
00332       double localEnergy = 0; 
00333       localEnergy = addForces(false, true); 
00334       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00335       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &energy_, 1, 
00336                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00337       #else
00338       energy_ = localEnergy;
00339       #endif
00340    }
00341 
00342    /*
00343    * Return total pair energy from all processors.
00344    */
00345    template <class Interaction>
00346    double BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy()
00347    {  return energy_; } 
00348 
00349    /*
00350    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00351    */
00352    template <class Interaction> double 
00353    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00354    {
00355       // Preconditions
00356       //if (!storagePtr_->isInitialized()) {
00357       //   UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage must be initialized");
00358       //}
00359 
00360       Vector f;
00361       double rsq;
00362       double bondEnergy;
00363       double energy = 0.0;
00364       GroupIterator<2> iter;
00365       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00366       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00367       int type;
00368       int isLocal0, isLocal1;
00369 
00370       storagePtr_->begin(iter);
00371       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00372          type = iter->typeId();
00373          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00374          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00375          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00376          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00377          // Set f = r0 - r1, minimum image separation between atoms
00378          rsq = boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00379                                         atom1Ptr->position(), f);
00380          if (needEnergy) {
00381             bondEnergy = interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type);
00382             if (isLocal0 && isLocal1) {
00383                energy += bondEnergy;
00384             } else {
00385                energy += 0.5*bondEnergy;
00386             }
00387          }
00388          if (needForce) {
00389             // Set force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00390             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type);
00391             if (isLocal0) {
00392                atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00393             }
00394             if (isLocal1) {
00395                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00396             }
00397          }
00398       }
00399       return energy;
00400    }

00402    #if 0
00403    /* 
00404    * Compute total stress (generic).
00405    */
00406    template <class Interaction>
00407    template <typename T>
00408    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) 
00409       const
00410    {
00411       Vector dr, force;
00412       double rsq;
00413       const Atom* atom0Ptr;
00414       const Atom* atom1Ptr;
00415 
00416       setToZero(stress);
00417 
00418       // Iterate over all bonds in Simulation
00419       Simulation::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00420       Molecule::ConstBondIterator bondIter;
00421       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00422          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nBond() > 0) {
00423             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00424                molIter->begin(bondIter); 
00425                for ( ; bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00426                   atom0Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(0));
00427                   atom1Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(1));
00428                   rsq = boundary().distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00429                                               atom1Ptr->position(), dr);
00430                   force = dr;
00431                   force *= interaction().forceOverR(rsq, 
00432                                                   bondIter->typeId());
00433                   incrementPairStress(force, dr, stress);
00434                }
00435             }
00436          }
00437       }
00438 
00439       stress /= boundary().volume();
00440       normalizeStress(stress);
00441    }
00442 
00443    template <class Interaction>
00444    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) const
00445    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }

00451 
00452    template <class Interaction>
00453    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Tensor& stress) 
00454         const
00455    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
